description: The goal Intermediate Korean I is to equip students with communicative competence that enables students to use Korean in real-life situations in a culturally appropriate manner. Conducted by the current communicative approach, the class will proceed with dynamic student-centered activities in which students will individually or collaboratively work on various topics such as weather, fashion, travel, public transportation, and shopping. In addition, students will practice dynamic language functions as well as experience language use in contextualized and authentic ways. Students will have various cultural experiences and on-line activities that will provide students with opportunities to interact with Korean native speakers. The proficiency of intermediate low/mid of national standards will be achieved in four language skills in an intergrated way in interpersonal communication, interpretive communication, presentational communication, comparison, and culture in the covered topics.
name: INTERMEDIATE KOREAN I
